item.description:
You are invited to the NorthShore MA pug meetup
When: The 2nd Saturday of every month (Rain or Shine)
Time: 9:00am-11:00am
Where:
950 Cummings Center
Beverly, MA 01915
1-978-921-1300

The new owner of The Office Bark, has agreed to host our pug meets in their facility. The space has an indoor play area and an attached outdoor play area and both are fully enclosed. All pugs can be off leash and safe.
Please bring your own chair if you would like to sit as the space is set up for dogs not people.

Also if you are interested: Linda, who is a Certified Master Groomer, has offered to do puggy pampering treatments: Nail clipping, ear cleaning, wrinkle cleaning and a quick brush out for just $12.00 per pug. If you would like to get this done while you are at the meetup see Linda when you get there

meetup organizer: Jodi Webster
jwebster@mitre.org


Thanks everyone!

group.name: The Northshore MA Pug Meetup Group

item.name: Monthly Pug Meetup
